snippet: San Bernardino is facing a budget shortfall of $45 million and fears that it will not be able to cover payroll through the summer.
abstract: San Bernardino will become the third California city to file for bankruptcy this year; decision follows a budget shortfall of $45 million and the admission by officials that the city may not even be able to cover payroll through the summer.
lead_paragraph: San Bernardino is facing a budget shortfall of $45 million and fears that it will not be able to cover payroll through the summer.

headline.seo: San Bernardino Council Votes to File Bankruptcy
headline.main: Third City In California Votes to Seek Bankruptcy
headline.print_headline: Third City In California Votes to Seek Bankruptcy
